item.title: New York Yankees Broadcasters Get Animated for Season 2 of YES Network Kids Show
item.description: ‘HexClad Presents Bronx Buds’ Returns for a second season Aug. 9, joined by guest stars and YES broadcasters Michael Kay, John Flaherty, Meredith Marakovits and Nancy Newman.
